title: What are the types of music? - Quora

response.answer_text: The term you are looking for is genre. A genre is defined as "a class or category of artistic endeavour having a particular form, content, technique, and the like." There are so many genres of music, I couldn't possibly list them all...and that would be assuming that I know them all, which I don't. Genres can be as broad as Rock music, or as specific as Scottish Pirate metal. Here's a link for you to check out: http://www.musicgenreslist.com/
